org.crosswire.common.util
类 ResourceUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.common.util.ResourceUtil

public final class ResourceUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Better implementations of the getResource methods with less ambiguity and that are less dependent on the specific classloader situation.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com], DM Smith [ dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com ]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

方法详细信息

getResource

public static java.net.URL getResource(java.lang.String search)
                                throws java.util.MissingResourceException
Generic resource URL fetcher. One way or the other we'll find it! Either as a relative or an absolute reference.

参数：
search - The name of the resource (without a leading /) to find
返回：
The requested resource
抛出：
java.util.MissingResourceException - if the resource can not be found

getResource

public static <T> java.net.URL getResource(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                           java.lang.String resourceName)
                                throws java.util.MissingResourceException
Generic resource URL fetcher. One way or the other we'll find it! Either as a relative or an absolute reference.

参数：
clazz - The resource to find
返回：
The requested resource
抛出：
java.util.MissingResourceException - if the resource can not be found

getResourceAsStream

public static java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String search)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.util.MissingResourceException
Generic resource URL fetcher

返回：
The requested resource
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the file
java.util.MissingResourceException - if the resource can not be found

getResourceAsStream

public static <T> java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                          java.lang.String search)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.util.MissingResourceException
Generic resource URL fetcher

返回：
The requested resource
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the file
java.util.MissingResourceException - if the resource can not be found

getProperties

public static PropertyMap getProperties(java.lang.String subject)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Get and load a properties file from the writable area or if that fails from the classpath (where a default ought to be stored)

参数：
subject - The name of the desired resource (without any extension)
返回：
The found and loaded properties file
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the resource can not be loaded
java.util.MissingResourceException - if the resource can not be found

getProperties

public static <T> PropertyMap getProperties(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Get and load a properties file from the writable area or if that fails from the classpath (where a default ought to be stored)

参数：
clazz - The name of the desired resource
返回：
The found and loaded properties file
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the resource can not be loaded
java.util.MissingResourceException - if the resource can not be found
